attributes.action: Make parents face Criminal justice for there under 16 years olds ciminal acts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that parents should be punished for there under 16 year old children criminal acts, why should they get away with criminal acts because of there age. If parents are facing fines or even jail then maybe they will stop killing. thieving and in general breaking the law.
